1b1: rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa bing sha ti sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/
1b2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu dang po/ bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang
1b3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
1b4: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri rgod 'phungs pa la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge
1b5: 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon
1b6: mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol pa/ shes rab shin tu
1b7: rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba
1b8: rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin
2a1: du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa
2a2: dga' bo'o/ / dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu med pa kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems
2a3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can// rtog pa
2a4: med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa
2a5: zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa
2a6: le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha bsag med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i
2a7: chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bjod pa dam pa rtogs par khod du chd pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi kas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las
2a8: kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
2b1: cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/
2b2: sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa/ zil gyis
2b3: gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang /
2b4: mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra
2b5: ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
2b6: du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin du thob pa/ las dang nyon mongs
2b7: pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang /
2b8: kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun du sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa
3a1: rab tu rtogs par bya ba ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sna brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun ma chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa chad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag
3a2: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' las pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lim gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sa sa
3a3: rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems
3a4: can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyod pa'i nyon mongs pazhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal
3a5: pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha s+t+ra ga dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen snying po dang / rin chen byin pa dang / de
3a6: dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / skyob spang dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / blo gras mtha'
3a7: yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med blo gros dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong
3a8: brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'jom pa
3b1: dang / rdo rje tho gros dang / lagan rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brgyad dang / snying rje rjer sems dang / rgyan chen po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ra ba'i thom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3b2: byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas
3b3: sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so// de na bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba
3b4: dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan
3b5: gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ / de ltar gzigs nas su thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag
3b6: khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs
3b7: zlas mo gnyis dang / zhabs parla gnyis dang / sgra s+thA DUr gnyis dang / skule ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / u ts+yai ba lags gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan dpal gyi ba bulas kyang 'od par bye khrag
3b8: khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung / / phyagag ser ma bcu las kyang 'a zer bye ba khrag khrig tu stong drug cu drug byung de bzhin du phyag la gang gnyis dang / mu phrag pa gnyis dang / mgra da /
4a1: tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi ske nas kyang
4a2: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu po de dag thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba
4a3: chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
4a4: dad 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams
4a5: cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis baspu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
4a6: rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang lho nub dang nub
4a7: byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang 'od dris
4a8: gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong
4b1: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang
4b2: shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gA gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / sems can gang gis 'od de
4b3: mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram
4b4: ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya
4b5: stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgya las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ mdab ma stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ bltan sdug pa//
4b6: yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang pa/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs
4b7: shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi na pa ma da/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyikhams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byin nas
4b8: 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi
5a1: phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/
5a2: sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du
5a3: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin/ seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
5a4: khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to/ rab tu 'gul to// kun du 'gul to// sdeg go/ rab tu sdeg go// kun du sdeg go// chem chem // rab tu chem chem
5a5: kun tu chem chem mo/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du 'ur 'ur ro// shig shiag/ rab tu shig shig/ ku du shig shigo/ shar mthon na ni nub dpa'/ nub mtho na ni shar dma'/ byang mtho na ni lha dma'/ lha mtho ni byang dma'/
5a6: mtha' mthon pas dmar/ dbus mthon nimatha'adam ste/ dam bus bags kyis nyams su ba bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang 'de ba bskyed par gyur to// de nas de' cha skad cig yud tsam thang cigs
5a7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang // ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang /
5a8: ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang // mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa
5b1: gsum dang / mtshom dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / gal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / mi dang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams pang
5b2: ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal
5b3: te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang //
5b4: nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song
5b5: gi skye gnas thams cad dadagashin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dge thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de
5b6: dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjesu dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag/ rang rang
5b7: gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra /
5b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa/
6a1: de dag thams cad kyang / mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug
6a2: pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ / gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par
6a3: gyur te/ nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po mtshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur te/ lus dang ga
6a4: yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tshe ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/
6a5: pa dang ma dang / pu nu dang sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan
6a6: zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge
6a7: slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ / de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni
6a8: dge ba'o/ / zhi ba ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// dben pa ni dge ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa ni dge ba'o// srog chags su/
6b1: rgyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs
6b2: suM dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang
6b3: bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang /
6b4: dpal gyis mdzes shing / lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang /
6b5: dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal
6b6: gyis mdzes shing / lha ma me/ lhan ne lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten
6b7: gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri
6b8: nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa na mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes
7a1: shing l+h+wam me/ ldan ne// lhang ngo'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dkyil 'bar 'od gzhan thams cad zil che gnan par gnas pa ni mangs shing / lham me/ ldan ne// ltang po// de bzhin du bcom ldan
7a2: 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang
7a3: dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to//
7a4: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshom
7a5: dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas
7a6: dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pa
7a7: la dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / pun da ri ka dang / na lin dang / sau gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sar dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba
7a8: dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / bun da ri ka dang /
7b1: na len dang / so gan d+hi dang / me tog gi sar dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bdan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to/ mngon papa
7b2: rab tu gtong / / sang gsum gyi snang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mdza snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang martag rgya las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang ba khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das
7b3: gdan bder dang ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
7b4: ngan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gnam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji
7b5: rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog
7b6: dang / dar gyi lnga ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin du mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin du mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan
7b7: ne/ lhang nger gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing
7b8: gsal bar gyur to/ / lho dang nub dang pyad kyang shar dang shar lho dang / lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /
8a1: bcom ldan 'das kyi'ang snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur // dal 'jam pa' gling ba/ ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul bas chags shes pa mthang nas 'di snyam du sems par
8a2: gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba blang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang
8a3: gi sgra ma snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
8a4: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
8a5: shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khrid la bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu
8a6: snang bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs dang lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang
8a7: par gyur to/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
8a8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
8b1: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
8b2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur te/ / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang /
8b3: shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang
8b4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
8b5: sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ / de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
8b6: yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
8b7: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang
8b8: ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
9a1: chen 'byung gnas gangan ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ran chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das 'ang chen pa 'di lta bu 'dzag rten/
9a2: du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung
9a3: gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
9a4: snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo // de byang
9a5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/
9a6: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
9a7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAHthub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang bal char gzhan nur gyur pa/ gzungs dngas so yang
9a8: dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis
9b1: bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de 'dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang zer kun nas 'byung ba la
9b2: pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
9b3: rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog
9b4: can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis
9b5: gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis
9b6: der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
9b7: 'byung gnas de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
9b8: stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang spos dang bdug
10a1: spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim grong bya ba dang / kung bsting bya ba dang / sti stang du byad da 'chod byed cing tu nu sems da'i bu chen po dbu chu mas
10a2: dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
10a3: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
10a4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mda' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba
10a5: dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du
10a6: bskur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10a7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs
10a8: shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
10b1: gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par//
10b2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// ste stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung //
10b3: gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
10b4: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
10b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
10b6: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces
10b7: gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / degs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu 'di lta bug pa di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
10b8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams//
11a1: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
11a2: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a3: chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de
11a4: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal/
11a5: cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11a6: gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
11a7: mya ngan med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
11a8: pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo
11b1: gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag
11b2: gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/
11b3: der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de
11b4: las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/
11b5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
11b6: dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bye ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i
11b7: mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
11b8: phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
12a1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myang na med pa 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par
12a2: spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas
12a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor
12a4: to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
12a5: nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
12a6: khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
12a7: thub pa la rim gror byas so/ / bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun
12a8: gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shong 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub
12b1: mam pa'as bas dpa' rin pa rnams pa shes da kyis sa tu ldan pa 'ang nyid yang dag par don pa mad do/ / denas 'jig rten byalams den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can bsnad par rnazlas shes byabya/
12b2: 'dug 'dug pas/ sdang ba chen po de dang / sache g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sru bldan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b3: sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro ga ngan pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byang ba dang / don
12b4: sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
12b5: pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
12b6: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong do/ / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
12b7: te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
12b8: 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bstan bkur ba
13a1: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gnon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad/
13a2: la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ran chen 'od 'bros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
13a3: rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom
13a4: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam//
13a5: bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab mo stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
13a6: slad du bskur ro/ zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing deng bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
13a7: sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgru par dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po spyod pa'i tho gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs padag
13a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phrod las/ bde mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i
13b1: gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad
13b2: la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub
13b3: sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas//
13b4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
13b5: shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma
13b6: mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
13b7: pa rin chen 'od 'bros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
13b8: klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab
14a1: par gyur to/ / pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te/ chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis
14a2: thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag
14a3: gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod
14a4: pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
14a5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang
14a6: dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs/
14a7: pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gad na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
14a8: bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu
14b1: gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
14b2: to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
14b3: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas
14b4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi
14b5: mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b6: chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du
14b7: mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub
14b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
15a1: bdagra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdag pade'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang
15a2: dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//
15a3: zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15a4: de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15a5: sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
15a6: stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang /
15a7: phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
15a8: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
15b1: la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//
15b2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun ma mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyam/
15b3: dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la
15b4: mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas
15b5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di
15b6: ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
15b7: par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa
15b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rimi gror byas so/ / bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
16a1: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dam
16a2: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang
16a3: dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher
16a4: g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i
16a5: dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung
16a6: ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po
16a7: dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig
16a8: rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
16b1: bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo / / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
16b2: po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi kham
16b3: mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'//
16b4: sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob
16b5: pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/
16b6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po gnyis pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas
16b7: rnam par gnon pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bsgyur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
16b8: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/
17a1: padam gsar dbya bdagacan 'bas gang dang ldan pa 'ad dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das dbazhi gshegs pa ting 'dzin gyi glang pa dab pa'i dpal byas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i snang
17a2: du bskur ro zhes kyang byis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
17a3: sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17a4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
17a5: khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byad shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs
17a6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag
17a7: gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang ste stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
17a8: btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gdan bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu
17b1: 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
17b2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes
17b3: par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
17b4: mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dgag
17b5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo
17b6: de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/
17b7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsabam/ btsu
17b8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim thor byas so/ / bkur sting byas so// ga stang du byas so// mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
18a1: de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin du yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/
18a2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi/
18a3: pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher
18a4: g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba
18a5: der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogos 'di ltar cher g.yos//
18a6: pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i sgra ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a7: dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
18a8: mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong do// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18b1: nams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i
18b2: dpal la 'ang skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems
18b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang bal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzangs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag
18b4: blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/
18b5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/ pad mo rin pa che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das skran mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes
18b7: par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad lo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mongam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad
18b8: du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
19a1: sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19a2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
19a3: dang / / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
19a4: bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan
19a5: ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19a6: ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
19a7: gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan pa dmos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
19a8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo ba dog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes
19b1: 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan
19b2: 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtsham
19b3: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi kham
19b4: de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de
19b5: sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs/
19b6: su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so//
19b7: sti stang du byas so// mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
19b8: rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba gzhags shing mtsho skong ste/
20a1: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a2: dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
20a3: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
20a4: snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba/
20a5: 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub
20a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
20a7: pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yodade/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems
20a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba sa/ bcom ldan 'das nyi
20b1: ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang // 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/
20b2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20b3: chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i//
20b4: slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
20b5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sdang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi
20b6: rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/
20b7: bcom ldan 'das spyan mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo ba dog bde'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mog ser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang
20b8: ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag
21a1: gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
21a2: mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21a3: pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang /
21a4: bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
21a5: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
21a6: stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
21a7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/
21a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
21b1: nyim dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sgra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo
21b2: gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan
21b3: 'das la mchod pa'i slad du babyung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
21b4: rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
21b5: cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mode dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos
21b6: bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang
21b7: rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so// mchod par byas
21b8: nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
22a1: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
22a2: kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rini chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dngas cher
22a3: g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pa gdan pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
22a4: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
22a5: 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por ni chen mchog la 'di skad ces ba
22a6: stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di nis shang lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'ad la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa
22a7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAHthub pa zhes byab bzhugs shing 'tsho myong ngo / / de byang chub sem sa pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi po rol tu sbyin pa ston// 'di ni de'i mthu yin te 4
22a8: 'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten
22b1: gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems
22b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob
22b3: pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22b4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chen mchog la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
22b5: pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mda' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo
22b6: bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas//
22b7: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes
22b8: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin tshon mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de
23a1: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
23a2: dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyisang
23a3: rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye me dang na bza' dang rgyan dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
23a4: ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stong du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
23a5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
23a6: gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
23a7: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dris/
23a8: pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
23b1: mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mode dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
23b2: rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams/
23b3: cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad me de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang
23b4: gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu me'i gzugs su 'dug pa
23b5: de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas
23b6: so/ / mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
23b7: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du
23b8: phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de
24a1: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan chags shes pa de mthod nas/ bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dpal gdan
24a2: de sa skye ldan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ma ba la de la 'di skad cesags laka/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang chen pa 'dis
24a3: ltabu'ijig rten du byung ba dang / dgas 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda'ab 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
24a4: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pade mi dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi phyogs
24a5: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'i
24a6: bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong nga/ / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a7: chen po bod mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24a8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal
24b1: cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
24b2: de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i
24b3: dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
24b4: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdag bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
24b5: bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
24b6: slad du bskur ro zhes kyong gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
24b7: sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
24b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dpal de las/ pad mi gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag grangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang
25a1: bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
25a2: 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang
25a3: du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
25a4: shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25a5: chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das
25a6: la spyan mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /
