138a7: bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa stog nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
138a8: pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar
138b1: gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste//
138b2: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid
138b3: kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
138b4: gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
138b5: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par
138b6: shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
138b7: pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnamagrangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes pa
138b8: bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ / gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid/ gzugs smon pa med
139a1: pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa
139a2: nyi ma mchis te/ gzugs sman pa mad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyi gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
139a3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
139a4: bar mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong
139a5: pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang
139a6: stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnams grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
139a7: ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med de zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dpan
139b1: nyid/ gzugs dpan pa nyid byas stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
139b2: gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
139b3: gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de na
139b4: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa
139b5: dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
139b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b7: dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid
140a1: gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
140a2: grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
140a3: ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid
140a4: do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srad
140a5: du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos
140a6: kyi dbyings kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas
140a7: par mi bgyi'o/ / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stod ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
140a8: cho tsun me da nga nyid pa lags/ chos rgyan ma da nga nyid las thad na pang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos byon pa da to nyid/ stong pa nyid co rtson me da nyid do// bcom san da sa tha na/ byang chu
140b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
140b2: 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ / yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ya
140b3: dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas
140b4: par mi bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
140b5: gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par
140b6: 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/
140b7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal
140b8: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na/ de yang dag
141a1: ba'i mtha' mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'dra bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
141a2: phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
141a3: mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags// tsher
141a4: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags/ yang dag pa'i
141a5: mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i skad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis
141a6: stong pa'i slad du yongs su zung ba ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa tshe/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par brtse
141a7: sa ma pa med pa ma sa par / bam na rgya mam dang mapan pa nga dzin mas dpas sum nang sa
141a8: gyib ste/ kye cheg phu dub kyi gatsha ma mtshig tshad ma mchis par das pa// na tho dpa nga sangs rgyas thams cad ces mi thogs shing / de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa
141b1: sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yang nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyin stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
141b2: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
141b3: cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyisang du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa 'od ci'i slad du zhe na/
141b4: de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/ mtshan ma de dag gang zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma'o// tshor ba ni mtshan mi'o// 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o// 'du byed ni mtshan ma'o// rnam
141b5: bar shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/ / mig ni mtshan ma'o// na ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o//
141b6: na ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
141b7: dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dras te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
141b8: las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba
142a1: ni mtshan ma'o/ / sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o// 'du byed dang /
142a2: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o//
142a3: tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o// nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan
142a4: ma'o/ / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
142a5: rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad padang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tsha de med pa rnams dang /
142a6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
142a7: rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni
142a8: mtshan ma'o/ / ye ge rnams ni mtshan ma'o// gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o// tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste// de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du byen
142b1: bzu ga gzha/ gan yang san sa da ldan 'i gsa'adul pa par mi tha pa// dang pag sha/ 2/ pa sa byed pal
142b2: dang / rtog pa dang / mas pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste/ de la nga mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so// de ltar na/ de ni mtshan
142b3: mad mamamam mchis pa dang / yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags te/ kun nga ng+gA baphreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas/ dang pa'i rjes su 'thas
142b4: bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/ de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo // de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
142b5: stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa mi dmigs te/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang /
142b6: thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis/ phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de rtogs pa dang / thob par bgyi ba'i
142b7: tshul gyis de las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag
142b8: par rjes su ma mthong ste/ des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ye shes de
143a1: gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // ye shes de gzugs
143a2: kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang
143a3: dag par rjes su ma mthong / / ye shes de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' nang du yang yang dag
143a4: par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa
143a5: gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / rnam grangs 'di la kun du rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te/ de ltar mos par gyur nas/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi
143a6: dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos par gyur nas/ des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung
143a7: ba ma mchis te/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis/ gtad du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i tshes gang yang des mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom
143a8: sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su
143b1: mi 'dzin pa dang / tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar
143b2: 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
143b3: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
143b4: rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang // mngon par 'dub gyi
143b5: ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pas/
143b6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/
143b7: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan
143b8: bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
144a1: bar shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
144a2: 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smon 'amam lags pa da nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags/
144a3: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
144a4: dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
144a5: ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
144a6: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma
144a7: bzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang // chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
144a8: bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
144b1: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na de la shes rab rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhes
144b2: yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de de ltar yongs su rtag cing nye bar sems pa'i tshe/ chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de ni
144b3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes gal te de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis mi dmigs
144b4: so/ / gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
144b5: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
144b6: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
144b7: stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
144b8: stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med cing dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang // bzod pa'i pha rol du/
145a1: phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
145a2: stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
145a3: nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
145a4: stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
145a5: nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
145a6: dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
145a7: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
145a8: stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ / pha rol du phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
145b1: tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
145b2: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
145b3: bcwa brgyad med cing mi dmigs so/ / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
145b4: 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
145b5: kyi bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
145b6: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med
145b7: cing mi dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i
145b8: phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
146a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la// mi 'jigs mi sdang
146a2: skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146a3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
146a4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par shes pa ni
146a5: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched
146a6: dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
146a7: dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
146a8: dang bral ba/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
146b1: dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs/
146b2: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
146b3: dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni/ sangs
146b4: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ga lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
146b5: pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba// de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
146b6: kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
146b7: tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
146b8: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// yang dag pa'i mtha' bar/
147a1: ci rang bzhin ni ni lta za// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang wAn pA shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos pa med pa'o// tshe ra ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med
147a2: pa'o/ / sgra mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs
147a3: kyi rang bzhin med pa dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang // skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten
147a4: cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la
147a5: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med do// khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan
147a6: nyid med do/ / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do// yang dag pa'i mthi' bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do//
147a7: mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba 'jun
147a8: ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
147b1: de ci'i phyir zhe na// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
147b2: dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba
147b3: yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
147b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar/ lus yongs su
147b5: dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs
147b6: su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang
147b7: ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sdud pa dang ldan pa dang / swa ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ngargyal dang / g.yo dang / spu dang /
147b8: ga dag dang ser sna dang / med pa dang / ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas// nam yang ma'i mangs du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par/ nam
148a1: yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/
148a2: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
148a3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
148a4: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas tshe dang
148a5: ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs
148a6: la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi
148a7: bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal
148a8: te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang //
148b1: rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
148b2: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te
148b3: gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
148b4: ma la spyod do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
148b5: byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar
148b6: spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smod do// bcom ldan 'das
148b7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
148b8: thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
149a1: rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa dgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzus kyi sgo rnams dang /
149a2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang /
149a3: bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
149a4: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149a5: po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom mo zhes
149a6: bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par 'gyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
149a7: so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a8: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i'atshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / na ba dang /
149b1: na ba dang / 'chi ba dang // mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
149b2: dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis drab na/ de rnam par shes pa la smos shing 'a shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'dabya ba la spyod de/ de ni b+ha ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
149b3: 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
149b4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin
149b5: gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
149b6: shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
149b7: pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus
149b8: te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos
150a1: shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ / ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa
150a2: dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
150a3: gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
150a4: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
150a5: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mngon par
150a6: 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi
150a7: 'grol bar brjod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang mngon du b+ha ba'i rgal ba med na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
150a8: chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgyab lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thab mim shes par bya// blas pa/
150b1: dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la ji ltar spyad na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa'
150b2: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
150b3: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang /
150b4: gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces
150b5: bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces
150b6: bya bar mi spyod/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
150b7: ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang // dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas
150b8: ba shes par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa 'i
151a1: kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa'i shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam
151a2: par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams
151a3: dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
151a4: rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
151a5: gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byabs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yid pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi
151a6: chos rnams pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang song pa
151a7: da do/ / dang na pashA ra ba'i byabyang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab gyi ngol du phyid pa la de ltar spyod pade/ thabasamakhas pa shes par bya'o// shes rabatu pa rol byed pa song brag thas ga/
151a8: bam po bcu gcig pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i
151b1: skal pa yod do/ / de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad kyang / spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa'ang ma yin mi spyod pa'ang
151b2: ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces
151b3: bya bar yang mi dmigs/ / spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ ma spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
151b4: ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/ byang chub sems
151b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so//
151b6: spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b7: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te sems ma zhum/ kun tu ma zhum/ mi skrag/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
151b8: po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
152a1: dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des
152a2: rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'da' zhig gis
152a3: rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
152a4: tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do//
152a5: smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
152a6: yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
152a7: dpa' chen po ni myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba
152a8: bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
152b1: spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi dbyings sungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams
152b2: cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dpung rnam par bkod pa
152b3: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting
152b4: 'dzin yod do/ / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i
152b5: phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
152b6: dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// smel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs
152b7: pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas la rten pa/ med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med pa zhes bya
152b8: ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dag pa
153a1: dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa zhes bya
153a2: ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
153a3: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba gsal ba zhes bya
153a4: ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa
153a5: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
153a6: yod do/ / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos
153a7: thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
153a8: 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab rib med pa
153b1: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes
153b2: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ya // byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
153b3: spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i nyid de 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nem nur/
153b4: rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i nyid nge 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
153b5: rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// brda dang sgra la
153b6: 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
153b7: mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
153b8: yod do/ / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'gal ba dang 'gog pa
154a1: thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
154a2: ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / zla ba dri ba med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i
154a3: ting nge 'dzin yod de/ / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting
154a4: nge 'dzin yod do/ / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid la
154a5: gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
154a6: nge'adzin yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin das rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du blan
154a7: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i
154a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems
154b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu chad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan
154b2: ba rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
154b3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
154b4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/
154b5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug
154b6: go/ / bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nga
154b7: 'jan 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
154b8: ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
155a1: rol du phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ / ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub
155a2: sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems
155a3: dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du
155a4: shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/
155a5: de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting
155a6: nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ / 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub
155a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs
155a8: so legs so/ / tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar des nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ci 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
155b1: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
155b2: pa la bslab par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
155b3: bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
155b4: bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
155b5: rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
155b6: pa'i tshul gyis skyob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs
155b7: pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
155b8: mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so// sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes ca
156a1: dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma dmigs so// shin du rnam par
156a2: dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag
156a3: pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i
156a4: phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar
156a5: gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
156a6: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs
156a7: so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par
156a8: dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/ / shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad
156b1: ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i
156b2: bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang
156b3: dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos
156b4: 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
156b5: ba/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa de la mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ra
156b6: dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
156b7: bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa
156b8: nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la
157a1: mngon pa shan cing / 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag migs mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su btags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ dran pa nye bar
157a2: gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su tog ste/ de dag migs mi mthong ngo //
157a3: mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub
157a4: kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dod pa ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas
157a5: 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin/
157a6: no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar
157a7: gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab
157a8: kyi ba rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par nen pa yin te/ der mngon par zhen pa yin na na/
157b1: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa
157b2: yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mngon par zhan pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi
157b3: bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
157b4: pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
157b5: pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das
157b6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
157b7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par
157b8: song ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pal brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bdan
158a1: pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid/
158a2: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
158a3: pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la btags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la pa tags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
158a4: sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158a5: po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bskabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub
158a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158a7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
158a8: du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe//
158b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
158b2: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
158b3: gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa
158b4: nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa
158b5: las le'u drug pa'o/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
158b6: pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes
158b7: bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
158b8: mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
159a1: rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri bde la ji skad du bstan
159a2: par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cing / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
159a3: yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
159a4: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan las/ sgyu
159a5: ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
159a6: pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la// sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
159a7: yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/
159a8: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
159b1: kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan nig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
159b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
159b3: so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltam
159b4: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
