181b1: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
181b2: 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
181b3: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
181b4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
181b5: sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
181b6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
181b7: rgyas kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
181b8: pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
182a1: reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
182a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
182a3: rgyas kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182a4: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i
182a5: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
182a6: tshor ba la gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
182a7: chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med
182a8: pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rgati
182b2: la gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
182b3: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i
182b4: phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b5: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
182b6: du phyin pa la gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub nyis
182b7: tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i
182b8: phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
183a1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
183a2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
183a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa rnams
183a4: dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
183a5: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de
183a6: dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi
183a7: dbyings la/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
183a8: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du
183b1: bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa mad pal gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gis rab kyi par ma byedan pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chag gdon mad
183b2: do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis/
183b3: pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang /
183b4: gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'dra shes dang /
183b5: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon
183b6: par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang /
183b7: khams dang / rkyen cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// bya
183b8: kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas/
184a1: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
184a2: dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
184a3: pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / me dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
184a4: phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin
184a5: du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
184a6: dper na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod/
184a7: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
184a8: yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / pasam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
184b1: pa thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
184b2: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
184b3: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gsob dang /
184b4: sgros bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tsher rab po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang /
184b5: shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
184b6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gidon medad/ / rab 'byor 'di la sku dper na/ nyi mi dkyil 'khar mngon par 'char ba'i cha/ mun pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
184b7: ranga' sems dpa' tsha ni pogs rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ga dan med/ / rab 'byarang 'di lta dper na/ bskal ba'i me 'bang ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyiganas med do//
184b8: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
185a1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/ tshum khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i
185a2: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
185a3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
185a4: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
185a5: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185a6: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye
185a7: shes gzigs pa la/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
185a8: med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
185b1: mdado/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong pa'i byang/
185b2: chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
185b3: 'phrul dbang byed dang / / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
185b4: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
185b5: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
185b6: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs
185b7: med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pag stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid
185b8: la bslab par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang
186a1: lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang / mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186a2: chen pos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
186a3: 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de
186a4: dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
186a5: bar bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni//
186a6: phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa
186a7: las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ma rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu
186a8: can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang /
186b1: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs
186b2: rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam
186b3: pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
186b4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / pra ma
186b5: dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal ba dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdung bar 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang /
186b6: log pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan
186b7: pa'odog gi lus ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ / yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung
186b8: ma bstan pa'o/ / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
187a1: 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi
187a2: dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten papa 'das ri'i tshe ma gtogs par/ de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
187a3: zhes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
187a4: dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
187a5: dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyong ba dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa
187a6: med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad
187a7: gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par
187a8: gyur pa'i rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ / gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so/
187b1: zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
187b2: so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs nye gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag pas 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung
187b3: zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du she ba med min skye mched la nye bar
187b4: bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa
187b5: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/
187b6: rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang
187b7: yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
187b8: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang
188a1: snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang
188a2: nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
188a3: 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
188a4: thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' ya skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du/ rnam shes mtha'
188a5: yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
188a6: shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs
188a7: te gnas so/ / de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spyod pa nyid kyi bar dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
188a8: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
188b1: zag pa dang bcas pa chos gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes b+hA ba ni/ 'dra lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bani dang / chad
188b2: med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/
188b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
188b4: yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
188b5: smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
188b6: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas
188b7: kyi chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang /
188b8: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus
189a1: ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid//
189a2: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/
189a3: bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
189a4: pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi tshes zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
189a5: stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o//
189a6: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/ chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul
189a7: gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub
189a8: sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed
189b1: bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
189b2: bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad
189b3: pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang
189b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub
189b5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
189b6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don tu bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog
189b7: pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ / bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//
189b8: de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis
190a1: ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ / bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag
190a2: gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ / bdag gis phung po nas brtsoms te/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
190a3: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis
190a4: chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems
190a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba
190a6: dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams
190a7: su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can ri'i don tu yang bskal pa bye ba khrag theg brgya stong mang por sems
190a8: can gang yang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes/ thabs de lta bus
190b1: sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis
190b2: nyams su myong bar bya'o/ / de nas gdong bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag/ khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
190b3: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems
190b4: dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis
190b5: sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi
190b6: skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
190b7: sems rlabs po che'o/ / des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skul ba'i sems dang ldan
190b8: par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
191a1: sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi stsal pa'o/ / sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems/
191a2: tsan thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad slob cing / sems can thams cad yongs
191a3: su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i bul mi
191a4: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i
191a5: nal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ / de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la/
191a6: chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o//
191a7: de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgo ma zhing / mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
191a8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191b1: po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i
191b2: phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
191b3: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang // rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
191b4: dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams
191b5: pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i bral du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byad
191b6: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhi dgos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas
191b7: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/
191b8: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phying byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
192a1: 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus
192a2: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta gang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / she bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang /
192a3: mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phud par lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin
192a4: pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang //
192a5: sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs
192a6: pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/
192a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/
192a8: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang /
192b1: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//
192b2: rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
192b3: dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
192b4: lta bskyed do/ / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin
192b5: gshegs pa'i stobs dang / / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya
192b6: ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
192b7: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
192b8: mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni gang gi slar du byad
193a1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
193a2: 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a3: dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma
193a4: mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de ci'i
193a5: slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
193a6: 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad du thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/
193a7: shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang /
193a8: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med
193b1: pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/ nyan thos kyi sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems
193b2: med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa
193b3: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems/ zag pa med pa dang / khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang
193b4: ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// smras pa/
193b5: tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang
193b6: chags pa med do/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do//
193b7: smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang chags pa med cing / khongs su chud pa med do zhes sbas pa ni de la yin te// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/
193b8: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
194a1: kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
194a2: kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
194a3: rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs
194a4: su chud pa med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin
194a5: stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
194a6: ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa
194a7: med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa
194a8: nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan
194b1: rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang 'du byed med pa dang rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do//
194b2: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
194b3: la chags pa med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags
194b4: pa med do/ / tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi
194b5: phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med
194b6: pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems/ mi
194b7: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par
194b8: chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi
195a1: slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ gang pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan
195a2: 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/
195a3: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
195a4: sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don tu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
195a5: shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas
195a6: shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo do// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod
195a7: bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa
195a8: pa yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can cung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan
195b1: skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi ce'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin
195b2: gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
195b3: su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ / sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed ni byang chub dgod par mi bya'o/
195b4: zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
195b5: yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa
195b6: dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang
195b7: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
195b8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
196a1: ba shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi gonams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu
196a2: brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a3: dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
196a4: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
196a5: yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
196a6: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
196a7: ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ / sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin
196a8: pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos
196b1: de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go
196b2: cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed
196b3: pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
196b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas/ nyan thos dang /
196b5: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
196b6: phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
196b7: yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs par/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang / thun
196b8: mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs
197a1: su gtong ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa
197a2: de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol
197a3: du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
197a4: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su
197a5: bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
197a6: dpa' chen po/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skye na so so'i skye bo'i sa lta
197a7: smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
197a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems
197b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
197b2: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi ba
197b3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
197b4: yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bA
197b5: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o//
197b6: tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
197b7: tshul khrims kyipa sa dubyed pa la khyod ma/ chos thams cad sgyum byas pa'i 'dug nye bar gan ny-i / rdu ma rjem das rnamam pas ma dang/ rang ba ni yang pa nyid kyi byur/ rdul khrim sa
197b8: dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
198a1: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol
198a2: du byin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan
198a3: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
198a4: shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan
198a5: pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
198a6: ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
198a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
198a8: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
198b1: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
198b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
198b3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
198b4: bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol
198b5: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
198b6: kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi
198b7: dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
198b8: po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
199a1: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ / pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang /
199a2: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
199a3: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan
199a4: ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
199a5: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
199a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos
199a7: dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa
199a8: dang / rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
199b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pa la du phyin pa la spyod cing /
199b2: sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / brgyan mi nges pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
199b3: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
199b4: gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
199b5: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
199b6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi
199b7: dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni// byang chub sam sa dpa' sems dpa na po brtson 'grus
199b8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
200a1: bas/ pha rol du byed pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan par mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
200a2: byin pa la spyod par/ pha rol du byed pa drug ga ga nar// tshe dang ldan pa t+tAr dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas mgatan kyi pha rol du byid pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang /
200a3: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
200a4: mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
200a5: pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
200a6: yin gyi/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
200a7: chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
200a8: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
200b1: pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
200b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
200b3: po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus
200b4: nyam par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
200b5: dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
200b6: gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/ sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
200b7: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
200b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
201a1: dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan nges kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs//
201a2: te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol
201a3: du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
201a4: bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
201a5: phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos
201a6: dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dge ba'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
201a7: de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
201a8: ba la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang /
201b1: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong
201b2: du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi
201b3: pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
201b4: pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
201b5: mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du
201b6: phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
201b7: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
201b8: pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pal/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
202a1: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
202a2: sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
202a3: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
202a4: phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
202a5: bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
202a6: ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202a7: chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
202a8: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa re re
202b1: na nga / sa dbya pa drug tha thams cad gas sa rdzogs par byung nga// ma dang ra kya rtsa gzhan sa byang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen pa bsam gtan dang / cad me pa dang /
202b2: gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam
202b3: gta dang / cang med pa dang / gzug med pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan
202b4: ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
202b5: sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong
202b6: bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil kyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
202b7: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b8: chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
203a1: byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
203a2: rnams kyang ched du brjod pa/ ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems
203a3: can yongs su smin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad de/ dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
203a4: gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin// gang
203a5: pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing // 'dod pas dben
203a6: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bskyabs te gnas so//
203a7: de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/
203a8: gtsugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ bstod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas
203b1: bar bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod de// de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa
203b2: tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa// bstod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas
203b3: gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /
203b4: tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
